title: Create AI-Based Smart Health Companion App Landing Page

requirements.text: Create a hero section with headline 'Your Complete Health, Powered by AI', subheading 'An integrated smart health companion that monitors fitness, diet, mental well-being, and preventive care — all in one place.', and two CTA buttons labeled 'Get Started' and 'Learn More'

quotes: Headline: "Your Complete Health, Powered by AI"
Subheading: An integrated smart health companion that monitors fitness, diet, mental well-being, and preventive care — all in one place.
Call-to-Action Buttons: Get Started, Learn More

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the exact headline and subheading text
Two CTA buttons are visible and labeled correctly
Section is visually prominent as the first content users see

requirements.text: Create a Problem section with title 'The Problem' explaining that many health apps focus on only one area (fitness or diet) while ignoring mental well-being and preventive care, with no single integrated solution providing a complete health picture

quotes: Nowadays, many health apps focus on only one area — either fitness or diet — while ignoring mental well-being and preventive care. There is no single integrated solution that provides a complete picture of a person's overall health.

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays 'The Problem' as the title
Content accurately describes the fragmented health app landscape
Text conveys the lack of integrated solutions

requirements.text: Create a Solution section with title 'Our Solution' describing an AI-based Smart Health Companion App that collects daily health inputs (food intake, physical activity, stress levels, sleep hours) and generates personalized health insights, preventive health recommendations, and smart lifestyle improvement suggestions using advanced AI analytics

quotes: We propose an AI-based Smart Health Companion App that delivers a complete and personalized health experience.
The system collects daily health inputs such as: Food intake, Physical activity, Stress levels, Sleep hours
Using advanced AI analytics, the app generates: Personalized health insights, Preventive health recommendations, Smart lifestyle improvement suggestions

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays 'Our Solution' as the title
Lists all four health input types: food intake, physical activity, stress levels, sleep hours
Lists all three AI-generated outputs: personalized insights, preventive recommendations, lifestyle suggestions
Content emphasizes AI-powered personalization

requirements.text: Create an Emergency Alert Feature section with title 'Smart Emergency Health Alerts' explaining that the system monitors for abnormal conditions (extreme heart rate, high stress levels, critical sleep deprivation), automatically triggers alerts, notifies users immediately, and redirects them to the nearest hospital or emergency service using GPS location

quotes: If the user's health data shows abnormal conditions such as: Extreme heart rate, High stress levels, Critical sleep deprivation
The system will: Automatically trigger an alert, Notify the user immediately, Redirect them to the nearest hospital or emergency service using GPS location

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays 'Smart Emergency Health Alerts' as the title
Lists the three abnormal conditions monitored: extreme heart rate, high stress levels, critical sleep deprivation
Describes the three-step emergency response: automatic alert trigger, immediate user notification, GPS-based redirection to nearest hospital
Content conveys intelligent health monitoring and safety features

requirements.text: Create a Features section listing six key features: AI-Powered Health Analysis, All-in-One Wellness Tracking, Mental & Physical Health Monitoring, Preventive Care Recommendations, Real-Time Emergency Alerts, and GPS-Based Emergency Assistance

quotes: Features Section: AI-Powered Health Analysis, All-in-One Wellness Tracking, Mental & Physical Health Monitoring, Preventive Care Recommendations, Real-Time Emergency Alerts, GPS-Based Emergency Assistance

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays all six features exactly as listed
Features are presented in a scannable, visually organized format
Each feature is clearly distinguishable from others

requirements.text: Create a footer with the tagline 'Smart Health. Smarter Living.'

quotes: Footer Tagline: Smart Health. Smarter Living.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays the exact tagline text
Tagline is positioned prominently in the footer

requirements.text: Apply a modern, innovative, and trustworthy visual design theme across the landing page with a sophisticated color palette (avoiding blue and purple unless naturally fitting health context), clean typography, and cohesive layout that conveys professionalism and user-friendliness appropriate for a health technology platform

quotes: Create a modern, responsive website for an AI-powered Smart Health Companion App that promotes complete well-being. The tone should be innovative, trustworthy, and user-friendly.

acceptanceCriteria: Visual design conveys innovation, trust, and user-friendliness
Color scheme is modern and appropriate for health technology context
Typography is clean and readable
Layout is cohesive across all sections
Design reinforces the professional nature of the health platform

constraints: Website must be fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
All content sections must use the exact copy provided in the user's message
Do not implement actual GPS location services, emergency alert logic, or LLM integrations - this is a landing page only
nonGoals: Backend health data collection or storage
Integration with external health APIs or services

required: Modern abstract health technology hero background with geometric patterns and gradients suggesting AI and wellness (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Minimalist icon representing integrated health monitoring showing interconnected health symbols (integrated-health-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Clean illustration of AI brain with health symbols radiating outward for solution section (ai-health-analysis.dim_512x512.png)
Emergency alert symbol with medical cross and notification waves (emergency-alert-icon.dim_256x256.png)
